item.title: Total Wireless Black Friday Deals: Get 4 Free Phones
item.description: Switch to the Total 5G+ Unlimited plan at Total Wireless and reap the benefits—no coupon needed.

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Codes: 15% Off Major Appliances
item.description: Get 15% off a selection of KitchenAid major appliances, such as refrigerators, oven ranges, dishwashers, cooktops, and more.

item.title: Visible Promo Code: Up to $240 Off Plans

item.title: DoorDash Promo Codes and Discounts: $0 Delivery in November

item.title: 30% off Samsung Promo Codes - November 2024 Coupons
item.description: Save up to 30% with a Samsung promo code and enjoy huge savings on top tech! Verified Samsung deals from WIRED help you save on your favorite gadgets.
